test.name: Wait For Click And Verify Result Test

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.
Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
Wait Until Page Contains
kw.msg: ValueError: Argument 'timeout' got value 'Action successful!' that cannot be converted to timedelta or None.
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.
kw.status: ValueError: Argument 'timeout' got value 'Action successful!' that cannot be converted to timedelta or None.

kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.

kw.name: Run Keyword And Return Status
Wait Until Page Contains
kw.msg: ValueError: Argument 'timeout' got value 'Action unsuccessful, please try again' that cannot be converted to timedelta or None.
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.
kw.status: ValueError: Argument 'timeout' got value 'Action unsuccessful, please try again' that cannot be converted to timedelta or None.

kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with given arguments and returns the status as a Boolean value.
